wxl - 2185$55 - 2020 cQ,s ui 23 jeks n%yiam;skaod - 2020'07'23
No. -  2185/55 - THURSDAY JULY ,  23,  2020
EXTRAORDINARY
The Gazette of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka
(Published by Authority)
PART I - SECTION I : GENERAL
Parliament Elections Act, No. 01 of 1981
Notice under Section 6 (1)
IN the exercise of the powers vested in the Election Commission by Section 6 (1) of the Parliament Elections Act,
No. 01 of 1981, we do by this notice appoint the officers mentioned in Column II of the Schedule hereto to assist the
Returning Officer of the Electoral District specified in the corresponding entry in Column I of that Schedule in the
performance of the duties of such Returning Officer in connection with the Parliament Election to be held in August 05th,
2020.
M
AHINDA D ESHAPRIYA, N. J. A BEYESEKERE, S. R A TNAJEEVAN H. HOOLE,
Chairman Member Member
Election  Commission. Election  Commission. Election  Commission.
Elections Secretariat,
Sarana Mawatha,
Rajagiriya,
23rd July, 2020.
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
1A
This Gazette Extraordinary can be downloaded from www.documents.gov.lk
w;s úfYI
G 34024 - 39 (2021/03)
N. B. - This Gazette published seperately in all three Languages.
